Class Quadrilaterals

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shapes
      • TwoDimensionalShape
        • Polygons
          • Quadrilaterals
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Kite, Parallelogram, Trapezoid

    public class Quadrilaterals
extends Polygons
    Class Quadrilateral used mostly as a parent class shared between Rectangle and Rhombus. It extends from Polygon as it shares multiple methods with it.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double base
      length of the base of the quadrilateral
      private double base2
      Length of the base opposite of "base" of the quadrilateral
      private double height
      height of the quadrilateral
      private double height2
      height opposite of "height" of the quadrilateral

    • Constructor Detail

      • Quadrilaterals

        public Quadrilaterals(java.lang.String shapeName,
                      double base,
                      double height,
                      double base2,
                      double height2)
        Class constructor for Quadrilaterals. It passes the shapeName, base, height, base2, and height2 to it's parent class.
        Parameters:
        shapeName - String containing the name of the shape.
        base - Length of the base of the shape.
        height - Height of the shape.
        base2 - Length of the side opposite of "base".
        height2 - Length of the side opposite of "height"
